title: doc: "A Tour of Go" video says "Japanese" instead of "Chinese"
body:
by **feedback.test.account**: 
https://feedback.corp.google.com/#/Report/1144130140

Description:
Go sounds like a cool programming language, but what bad is that you call Chinese words
as Japanese in your hello world program, that's a serious mistake and offensive!

UI language: en
Detected language: en
